sourcesContent:
Return Policy

Easy returns and hassle-free refunds. Your satisfaction is our guarantee.

30-Day Return Window Free Returns Over $50
30 Days to Return
Free Returns Over $50
5-7 Days Processing

Return Requirements

To be eligible for a return, your item must meet these conditions:

Original Tags

All tags must be attached and intact

Unworn Condition

Items must be unworn and unwashed

Original Packaging

Return items in original packaging

Same Condition

Items must be in original condition

Non-Returnable Items

Intimate apparel and swimwear
Items marked as "Final Sale"
Items that have been altered
Gift cards

Return Process

1

Log into Your Account

Navigate to your order history in your Thrifto account

2

Select Items to Return

Choose the items you wish to return and initiate a return request

3

Print Return Label

Download and print the provided prepaid return shipping label

4

Package Securely

Pack your items with all tags and original packaging

5

Ship Your Return

Drop off the package at any authorized shipping location

Shipping Options

Standard Return

Free*
  • Free returns within 14 days
  • $7.99 fee after 14 days
  • Processing time: 5-7 business days

Express Return

$14.99
  • Expedited processing
  • Processing time: 2-3 business days
  • Priority handling

Need Help?

Have questions about returns? Our support team is here to help.

Contact Support

Return Questions?

returns@thrifto.com
1-800-555-1234
